prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff RD Thong Swimwear in White, 80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne.

COMPOSITION: Bird's eye view. Thong swimwear laid perfectly flat showing full front view. Distinctive thong cut and waistband clearly visible.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- STYLE: Thong swimwear with minimal back coverage
- WAISTBAND: Ron Dorff branded waistband at top
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver) positioned at the lower front area
- Minimal, athletic thong construction
- Clean front panel with smooth sides transitioning to thong back

STYLING: Thong laid completely flat showing the distinctive cut. Waistband positioned naturally at top. Front panel smooth and centered.

COLOR: Match the EXACT "White" color from the input image - clean, bright white. NOT cream, NOT off-white, NOT gray. Pure white swimwear fabric.

MATERIAL: Smooth swimwear fabric with subtle sheen (80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne). Show the sleek, minimal construction.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even illumination. Avoid overexposure while maintaining bright white color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop that contrasts with white fabric.

High-end swimwear e-commerce aesthetic. Show the distinctive thong silhouette clearly.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on Ron Dorff RD Thong Swimwear in White, 80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets positioned at lower front area of the thong
- Show the smooth white swimwear fabric texture surrounding the eyelets

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Thong laid flat. Show fabric texture and eyelet detail clearly.

COLOR: White fabric visible in frame - clean, bright white tone.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets against the white fabric.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface providing contrast.
prompts.belt:
Detail shot of the waistband area on Ron Dorff RD Thong Swimwear in White, 80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Ron Dorff branded waistband
- Show branding/text on waistband clearly
- Clean elastic construction
- Show how waistband attaches to the thong front panel

COMPOSITION: Top-down 45-degree angle. Focus on waistband construction, branding, and attachment. Thong front panel partially visible below.

COLOR: White fabric with branded waistband (waistband may have color/text).

MATERIAL: Show the waistband texture, elastic construction, and branding clearly.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even illumination.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.

High-end swimwear detail photography. The branded waistband is a key design feature.
